test_cases.description: Create a todo with only the required title field.
test_cases.name: Create todo with minimal valid data

test_setup.when: create is called with the minimal valid data

test_cases.description: Create a todo with title, description, notes, and a valid expiry_date.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all valid fields

test_setup.when: create is called with all valid fields

test_cases.description: Attempt to create a todo without a title, expecting validation error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with missing title

test_setup.when: create is called with no title

test_cases.description: Attempt to create a todo with an empty string for title, expecting validation error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with empty title

test_setup.when: create is called with empty title

test_cases.description: Attempt to create a todo with expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD', expecting validation error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.when: create is called with invalid expiry_date format

test_cases.description: List endpoint should return an empty array when no todos exist.
test_cases.name: List todos when none exist

test_setup.when: list is called with no todos present

test_cases.description: List endpoint returns all existing todos with their current fields.
test_cases.name: List multiple existing todos

test_cases.description: Get-one endpoint returns the todo for an existing id.
test_cases.name: Get an existing todo by id

test_cases.description: Get-one endpoint returns error if the todo does not exist.
test_cases.name: Get a non-existent todo

test_cases.description: Update endpoint should update only the provided field (description) and leave others unchanged.
test_cases.name: Update a single field of an existing todo

test_setup.when: update is called with id '7' and a new description

test_cases.description: Update endpoint should update all provided fields.
test_cases.name: Update all fields of an existing todo

test_setup.when: update is called with id '8' and all fields

test_cases.description: Update endpoint should reject expiry_date values not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
test_cases.name: Update todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.when: update is called with id '9' and invalid expiry_date

test_cases.description: Update endpoint should return error when trying to update a non-existent todo.
test_cases.name: Update a non-existent todo

test_setup.when: update is called with id '999' and any data

test_cases.description: Delete endpoint removes the todo; it is not accessible afterward.
test_cases.name: Delete an existing todo

test_setup.when: delete is called with id '10'; then get is called with id '10'

test_cases.description: Delete endpoint returns an error if the todo does not exist.
test_cases.name: Delete a non-existent todo

test_cases.description: Create a todo with explicit notes: null; notes field should be set to null.
test_cases.name: Create todo with notes set to null

test_setup.when: create is called with notes: null

test_cases.description: Update a todo by setting description to null; description should be null after update.
test_cases.name: Update todo to remove description

test_setup.when: update is called with id '12' and description: null

test_cases.description: Creating with expiry_date as empty string should fail validation.
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date as empty string

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with only the required title succeeds and other fields are null or absent.
test_cases.name: Create todo with required title only

test_cases.description: Verify creating a todo with all fields provided and valid expiry_date persists the todo correctly.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all fields valid

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo without a title returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo missing required title

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with an empty title returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with empty title

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with an expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD' returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_cases.description: Verify that providing expiry_date as empty string returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date as empty string

test_cases.description: Verify that listing todos returns all persisted todo items with their stored fields.
test_cases.name: List all existing todos

given.precondition: At least two todos exist in the database

test_cases.description: Verify that getting a todo by valid id returns the full todo record.
test_cases.name: Get todo with valid id

given.precondition: A todo exists with id = todo_id_1

test_cases.description: Verify that getting a todo with an id not in the database returns an error.
test_cases.name: Get todo with nonexistent id

given.precondition: No todo exists with id = invalid_id

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with only some fields provided updates those fields and leaves others unchanged.
test_cases.name: Update todo with partial fields

given.precondition: A todo exists with id = todo_id_1

test_cases.description: Verify that updating expiry_date to a value not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD' returns an error.
test_cases.name: Update todo with invalid expiry_date format

given.precondition: A todo exists with id = todo_id_1

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo that does not exist returns an error.
test_cases.name: Update todo with nonexistent id

given.precondition: No todo exists with id = invalid_id

test_cases.description: Verify that deleting a todo with a valid id removes the item; subsequent GET or LIST does not return the deleted item.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with valid id

given.precondition: A todo exists with id = todo_id_2

test_cases.description: Verify that attempting to delete a todo that does not exist returns an error.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with nonexistent id

given.precondition: No todo exists with id = invalid_id

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with a title at maximum allowed length is accepted. (Assume max 255 chars)
test_cases.name: Create todo with long title

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with all optional fields set to null is accepted.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all optional fields explicitly null

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo to clear description, notes, and expiry_date to null works as expected.
test_cases.name: Update todo with fields set to null

given.precondition: A todo exists with id = todo_id_1 with all fields populated

test_cases.description: Verify that db_cursor commits after successful CRUD operations.
test_cases.name: db_cursor commits transaction on successful CRUD

then.result: Todo is persisted in database, transaction is committed

test_setup.when: db_cursor is used to insert a todo

test_cases.description: Verify that db_cursor closes the SQLite connection after context exit.
test_cases.name: db_cursor closes connection on context exit

then.result: Connection is closed, no open resources remain

test_cases.description: Verify that db_cursor rolls back transaction if an exception occurs within the context.
test_cases.name: db_cursor rolls back transaction on exception

given.operation: Raise exception inside db_cursor context after partial insert

then.result: No partial data is persisted, transaction is rolled back

test_cases.description: Verify that the init_db function creates the 'todos' table if it does not exist and initializes the database.
test_cases.name: Successful Database and Table Initialization

test_setup.given: Database file does not exist or 'todos' table is missing.
test_setup.then: A SQLite database file is created, and the 'todos' table exists with the specified schema.

test_cases.description: Verify that calling init_db multiple times does not result in errors or duplicate tables.
test_cases.name: Idempotent Table Initialization

test_setup.given: Database and 'todos' table already exist.
test_setup.then: No errors occur; database and table remain unchanged.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with only the required title succeeds and optional fields are null or absent.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Only Required Title

test_setup.given: API request to create todo with {"title": "Buy milk"}.
test_setup.then: Todo is created with 'title' set; 'description', 'notes', and 'expiry_date' are null or absent in response.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with all fields provided succeeds and values are stored.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with All Fields

test_setup.given: API request to create todo with {"title": "Call Bob", "description": "Discuss project", "notes": "Urgent", "expiry_date": "2024-07-01"}.
test_setup.then: Todo is created with all fields set and values returned as stored.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo without a title returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create Todo Missing Required Title

test_setup.given: API request to create todo with {"description": "No title"}.
test_setup.then: API returns HTTP error response indicating missing required field 'title'.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with empty title returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Empty Title

test_setup.given: API request to create todo with {"title": "", "description": "Empty title"}.
test_setup.then: API returns HTTP error response indicating 'title' must not be empty.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD' returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Invalid Expiry Date Format

test_setup.given: API request to create todo with {"title": "Renew license", "expiry_date": "07/01/2024"}.
test_setup.then: API returns HTTP error response indicating invalid expiry_date format.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with expiry_date '2024-02-29' (leap year) is accepted if valid.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Edge Case Expiry Date

test_setup.given: API request to create todo with {"title": "Leap year task", "expiry_date": "2024-02-29"}.
test_setup.then: Todo is created successfully with expiry_date '2024-02-29'.

test_cases.description: Verify that listing todos when no items exist returns an empty list.
test_cases.name: List Todos When None Exist

test_setup.given: No todos exist in database.
test_setup.then: API returns an empty array [].

test_cases.description: Verify that listing todos returns all existing items with their fields.
test_cases.name: List Todos When Multiple Exist

test_setup.given: Multiple todos exist in database.
test_setup.then: API returns array of todo items, each with their stored values for all fields.

test_cases.description: Verify that fetching a todo by valid ID returns the full todo record.
test_cases.name: Get Todo by Valid ID

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id = 1.
test_setup.then: API returns full todo record with all fields as stored.
test_setup.when: Get-one endpoint is called with id = 1.

test_cases.description: Verify that fetching a todo by nonexistent ID returns error.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Nonexistent ID

test_setup.given: No todo exists with id = 999.
test_setup.then: API returns HTTP error response indicating todo not found.
test_setup.when: Get-one endpoint is called with id = 999.

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with only some fields updates only those fields.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with Partial Fields

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id = 2. API request: {"description": "Updated desc"}.
test_setup.then: Todo's description is updated, other fields remain unchanged.
test_setup.when: Update endpoint is called with id = 2.

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with all fields updates all values.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with All Fields

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id = 3. API request: {"title": "New Title", "description": "New Desc", "notes": "New Note", "expiry_date": "2024-08-15"}.
test_setup.then: All fields are updated and returned as stored.
test_setup.when: Update endpoint is called with id = 3.

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD' returns error.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with Invalid Expiry Date

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id = 4. API request: {"expiry_date": "2024-8-5"}.
test_setup.then: API returns HTTP error response indicating invalid expiry_date format.
test_setup.when: Update endpoint is called with id = 4.

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with nonexistent ID returns error.
test_cases.name: Update Nonexistent Todo

test_setup.given: No todo exists with id = 999. API request: {"title": "Should not work"}.
test_setup.then: API returns HTTP error response indicating todo not found.
test_setup.when: Update endpoint is called with id = 999.

test_cases.description: Verify that deleting a todo by valid ID removes the item and it cannot be listed or fetched.
test_cases.name: Delete Todo by Valid ID

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id = 5.
test_setup.then: API returns success; todo with id = 5 is no longer accessible via list or get endpoints.
test_setup.when: Delete endpoint is called with id = 5.

test_cases.description: Verify that deleting a todo with nonexistent ID returns error.
test_cases.name: Delete Todo with Nonexistent ID

test_setup.given: No todo exists with id = 999.
test_setup.then: API returns HTTP error response indicating todo not found.
test_setup.when: Delete endpoint is called with id = 999.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with expiry_date '2024-12-31' (valid boundary date) is accepted.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Expiry Date Boundary Format

test_setup.given: API request to create todo with {"title": "End of year", "expiry_date": "2024-12-31"}.
test_setup.then: Todo is created successfully with expiry_date '2024-12-31'.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with a title at maximum allowed length is accepted.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Long Title

test_setup.given: API request to create todo with {"title": "T.repeat(255)"}.
test_setup.then: Todo is created successfully with long title if schema supports it.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with special characters in title is accepted.
test_cases.name: Create Todo with Special Characters in Title

test_setup.given: API request to create todo with {"title": "@#&!*_()[]{}"}.
test_setup.then: Todo is created with special characters in title.

test_cases.description: On component mount, todos are fetched from the API and rendered in the UI with all fields displayed.
test_cases.name: Fetch and render todos on mount

test_setup.given: Component is mounted, the API returns a list of todos with various combinations of fields (some with null/absent optional fields).
test_setup.then: Todos are displayed in a list, each showing title, description, notes, and expiry_date as available. Missing optional fields are rendered as blank or omitted.

test_cases.description: User creates a new todo, providing valid values for title, description, notes, and a valid expiry_date.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all fields

test_setup.given: Component is mounted, user clicks 'New todo' button.
test_setup.then: API is called with all fields, todo is created, and new todo appears in the list with all values rendered.
test_setup.when: User fills in title, description, notes, expiry_date ('2024-12-31') and submits the form.

test_cases.description: User creates a new todo with only the required title field; optional fields are omitted.
test_cases.name: Create todo with title only

test_setup.given: Component is mounted, user clicks 'New todo'.
test_setup.then: API is called with only title. Todo is created with null/absent optional fields, and appears in the list with only the title displayed.
test_setup.when: User enters a valid title, leaves description, notes, and expiry_date empty, and submits.

test_cases.description: User tries to create a new todo without entering a title.
test_cases.name: Create todo missing required title

test_setup.given: Component is mounted, user opens the 'New todo' form.
test_setup.then: Form validation fails or API returns error. No todo is created, and user sees an error indicating title is required.
test_setup.when: User submits the form with an empty title.

test_cases.description: User tries to create a new todo with the title field set to an empty string.
test_cases.name: Create todo with empty title

test_setup.given: Component is mounted, user opens 'New todo' form.
test_setup.then: Form validation or API returns an error. No todo is created, and error is displayed to the user.
test_setup.when: User enters an empty string for title and submits.

test_cases.description: User enters an expiry_date that doesn't match 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.given: Component is mounted, user opens 'New todo' form.
test_setup.then: API returns a validation error. No todo is created, and error about expiry_date format is shown.
test_setup.when: User enters a valid title and an invalid expiry_date ('31-12-2024'), then submits.

test_cases.description: User edits an existing todo, changing only some fields (e.g., description and notes).
test_cases.name: Edit todo to update some fields

test_setup.given: Component is mounted with existing todos. User clicks edit on a specific todo.
test_setup.then: API is called with only the updated fields. The todo in the list updates to reflect changes, other fields remain unchanged.
test_setup.when: User changes the description and notes and submits.

test_cases.description: User edits an existing todo and tries to set expiry_date to an invalid format.
test_cases.name: Edit todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.given: Component is mounted. User clicks edit on a todo.
test_setup.then: API rejects the update. Error is shown, todo is not changed.
test_setup.when: User enters '12/31/2024' as expiry_date and submits.

test_cases.description: User edits a todo and clears the description, notes, and expiry_date fields.
test_cases.name: Edit todo to remove optional fields

test_setup.given: Component is mounted with a todo that has all fields filled.
test_setup.then: API is called, optional fields are set to null/absent, todo is updated and rendered with only the title.
test_setup.when: User edits the todo, clears description, notes, and expiry_date, submits.

test_cases.description: User deletes a todo and confirms the action.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with confirmation

test_setup.given: Component is mounted with todos displayed.
test_setup.then: API is called to delete the todo. Todo is removed from the list, no longer accessible via UI.
test_setup.when: User clicks delete on a todo and confirms.

test_cases.description: User clicks delete but cancels at the confirmation prompt.
test_cases.name: Delete todo and cancel

test_setup.given: Component is mounted with todos displayed.
test_setup.then: No API call is made. Todo remains in the list and is unchanged.
test_setup.when: User clicks delete and cancels at the confirmation.

test_cases.description: Attempt to delete a todo that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Delete nonexistent todo

test_setup.given: Component is rendered with a stale list including a todo that was already deleted elsewhere.
test_setup.then: API returns an error for nonexistent id. Error is displayed; todo is removed from the UI if still present.
test_setup.when: User clicks delete on the non-existent todo and confirms.

test_cases.description: Edit form is pre-populated with the correct todo fields when editing.
test_cases.name: Get one todo renders edit form with correct data

test_setup.given: Component is mounted with multiple todos.
test_setup.then: TodoForm is shown with all fields (title, description, notes, expiry_date) pre-filled with that todo's data.
test_setup.when: User clicks edit on a todo.

test_cases.description: User tries to edit a todo that does not exist (e.g., navigates directly to edit route with missing/invalid id).
test_cases.name: Edit nonexistent todo

test_setup.given: Component is mounted, user attempts to edit a todo with an id not present in the backend.
test_setup.then: API returns not found error, user sees an error message or is redirected appropriately.
test_setup.when: Edit form is attempted to be shown.

test_cases.description: After a sequence of create, update, and delete operations, the todo list reflects the current state as stored in the API.
test_cases.name: List reflects all CRUD operations

test_setup.given: Component is mounted, user creates, edits, and deletes todos.
test_setup.then: Todos are fetched and the list always matches the current state returned by the API after each operation.
test_setup.when: User completes a series of CRUD actions.

test_cases.description: User creates a todo with a title at the maximum allowed length (e.g., 255 characters if limited).
test_cases.name: Create todo with maximum allowed title length

test_setup.given: Component is mounted, user opens 'New todo' form.
test_setup.then: API accepts and creates the todo. Todo displays with full title.
test_setup.when: User enters a title of T.repeat(255), valid optional fields, and submits.

test_cases.description: User creates a todo with expiry_date set to a valid leap day (e.g., '2024-02-29').
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date on leap day

test_setup.given: Component is mounted, user opens 'New todo' form.
test_setup.then: API accepts and creates the todo. Todo is listed with the expiry_date shown.
test_setup.when: User enters a valid title and expiry_date '2024-02-29', then submits.

test_cases.description: User edits a todo and tries to set the title to an empty string.
test_cases.name: Edit todo and set title to empty

test_setup.given: Component is mounted with existing todos.
test_setup.then: Form validation or API returns an error. Todo is not updated, and error is displayed to the user.
test_setup.when: User edits a todo, clears the title field, and submits.

test_cases.description: Simulate a network error during any API call (list, create, edit, delete).
test_cases.name: Handle network error on API calls

test_setup.given: Component is mounted.
test_setup.then: Error message is displayed to the user indicating a problem communicating with the server.
test_setup.when: User triggers an operation (e.g., create, edit, delete) and the API call fails due to network error.

test_cases.description: Verify that the TodoForm component renders all required input fields: title, description, notes, and expiry_date.
test_cases.name: Render All Form Fields

test_setup.given: TodoForm is mounted with default props.
test_setup.then: Title input, description textarea, notes textarea, and expiry_date input are visible.

test_cases.description: Ensure submitting the form with an empty title displays an error and does not call onSave.
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Empty Title

test_setup.given: TodoForm has empty title and any values for other fields.
test_setup.then: An error message is displayed for the title field, and onSave is not called.

test_cases.description: Verify that submitting the form with only a valid title and no other fields calls onSave with title and other fields as null/undefined.
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Only Title Filled

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title set to 'Buy milk', and description, notes, expiry_date are empty.
test_setup.then: onSave is called with { title: 'Buy milk', description: null, notes: null, expiry_date: null }.

test_cases.description: Verify that submitting the form with all fields filled and expiry_date in correct format calls onSave with all values.
test_cases.name: Submit Form with All Fields Valid

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title 'Task', description 'Desc', notes 'Notes', expiry_date '2024-06-30'.
test_setup.then: onSave is called with all provided values.

test_cases.description: Ensure submitting the form with expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD' displays an error and onSave is not called.
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Invalid Expiry Date Format

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title 'Task' and expiry_date '30/06/2024'.
test_setup.then: An error message is displayed for expiry_date, and onSave is not called.

test_cases.description: Test submitting the form with expiry_date '2024-02-29' (valid leap year date).
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Edge Case Expiry Date

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title 'Leap Year' and expiry_date '2024-02-29'.
test_setup.then: onSave is called with expiry_date '2024-02-29'.

test_cases.description: Test that the form accepts empty expiry_date as null.
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Empty Expiry Date

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title 'No Expiry' and no expiry_date provided.
test_setup.then: onSave is called with expiry_date as null.

test_cases.description: Test submitting a todo with a title at maximum reasonable length (e.g. 255 characters).
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Very Long Title

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title 'T.repeat(255)', other fields empty.
test_setup.then: onSave is called with the long title.

test_cases.description: Ensure submitting a title with only spaces is treated as empty and error is shown.
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Title of Only Whitespace

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title '   ' (spaces only).
test_setup.then: An error message is displayed for title, onSave is not called.

test_cases.description: Test updating an existing todo by changing only description and expiry_date, leaving title and notes unchanged.
test_cases.name: Update Existing Todo with Partial Fields

test_setup.given: TodoForm initialized with existing todo {title: 'Initial', description: 'Old', notes: 'Old', expiry_date: '2024-06-01'}.
test_setup.then: onSave is called with updated description and expiry_date, original title and notes.
test_setup.when: User changes description to 'New Desc' and expiry_date to '2024-07-01', then submits.

test_cases.description: Ensure updating an existing todo with an invalid expiry_date format shows error and does not call onSave.
test_cases.name: Update Todo with Invalid Expiry Date

test_setup.given: TodoForm initialized with existing todo and expiry_date changed to '07-01-2024'.
test_setup.then: Error message for expiry_date is displayed, onSave is not called.

test_cases.description: Verify that after successful submission the form is reset to empty fields.
test_cases.name: Reset Form After Successful Submit

test_setup.given: TodoForm has valid input for all fields.
test_setup.then: All form fields are cleared.
test_setup.when: User submits the form and onSave is called.

test_cases.description: Verify that notes field is optional and submitting without notes does not cause error.
test_cases.name: Notes Field Optional

test_setup.given: TodoForm has valid title and description, notes field empty.
test_setup.then: onSave is called, notes is null.

test_cases.description: Verify that description field is optional and submitting without description does not cause error.
test_cases.name: Description Field Optional

test_setup.given: TodoForm has valid title and notes, description field empty.
test_setup.then: onSave is called, description is null.

test_cases.description: Ensure expiry_date with characters (e.g. '2024-06-aa') is rejected and error shown.
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Expiry Date Containing Invalid Characters

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title 'Task' and expiry_date '2024-06-aa'.
test_setup.then: Error message for expiry_date, onSave not called.

test_cases.description: Test submitting expiry_date with month value over 12 (e.g. '2024-13-01').
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Expiry Date Month Overflow

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title 'Task' and expiry_date '2024-13-01'.
test_setup.then: Error message for expiry_date, onSave not called.

test_cases.description: Test submitting expiry_date with day value '00' (e.g. '2024-06-00').
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Expiry Date Day Underflow

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title 'Task' and expiry_date '2024-06-00'.
test_setup.then: Error message for expiry_date, onSave not called.

test_cases.description: Expiry_date with leading/trailing spaces (e.g. ' 2024-06-01 ') should be rejected.
test_cases.name: Submit Form with Expiry Date Leading/Trailing Whitespace

test_setup.given: TodoForm has title 'Task' and expiry_date ' 2024-06-01 '.
test_setup.then: Error message for expiry_date, onSave not called.

test_cases.description: Verify that the GET /todos endpoint returns an empty list when there are no todos in the database.
test_cases.name: GET /todos returns empty list when no todos exist

test_setup.given: Database is empty; no todos have been created.
test_setup.then: Returns 200 with an empty list.

test_cases.description: Verify that the GET /todos endpoint returns all todo items, each including all fields as stored.
test_cases.name: GET /todos returns all existing todos with fields

test_setup.given: Two todos exist in the database: one with all fields, one with only title.
test_setup.then: Returns 200 with both todos and their fields.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with only the required title succeeds and returns the created todo.
test_cases.name: POST /todos creates todo with only required title

test_setup.given: No preconditions.
test_setup.then: Returns 201 and todo with null optional fields.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with all fields valid succeeds and returns the created todo.
test_cases.name: POST /todos creates todo with all fields valid

test_setup.given: No preconditions.
test_setup.then: Returns 201 and todo with all fields as provided.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo without the required title field returns an error.
test_cases.name: POST /todos error when title is missing

test_setup.given: No preconditions.
test_setup.then: Returns 400 error.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with an empty title returns an error.
test_cases.name: POST /todos error when title is empty

test_setup.given: No preconditions.
test_setup.then: Returns 400 error.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with expiry_date in the wrong format returns an error.
test_cases.name: POST /todos error when expiry_date is invalid

test_setup.given: No preconditions.
test_setup.then: Returns 400 error.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with expiry_date at boundary value '0000-01-01' works.
test_cases.name: POST /todos creates todo with expiry_date at boundary

test_setup.given: No preconditions.
test_setup.then: Returns 201 and todo with boundary expiry_date.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with a very long title (255 chars) succeeds.
test_cases.name: POST /todos creates todo with very long title

test_setup.given: No preconditions.
test_setup.then: Returns 201 and todo with long title.

test_cases.description: Verify GET /todos/{id} returns the full todo record for a valid id.
test_cases.name: GET /todos/{id} returns todo with all fields

test_setup.given: Todo with id 1 exists with all fields.
test_setup.then: Returns 200 and full todo record.

test_cases.description: Verify GET /todos/{id} returns an error when todo with id does not exist.
test_cases.name: GET /todos/{id} returns error for nonexistent id

test_setup.given: No todo with id 9999 exists.
test_setup.then: Returns 404 error.

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with only some fields updates only those fields.
test_cases.name: PUT /todos/{id} updates only specified fields

test_setup.given: Todo with id 1 exists.
test_setup.then: Returns 200 and todo with updated description.

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with all fields updates all fields.
test_cases.name: PUT /todos/{id} updates all fields

test_setup.given: Todo with id 1 exists.
test_setup.then: Returns 200 and todo with updated fields.

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo with invalid expiry_date format returns an error.
test_cases.name: PUT /todos/{id} error for invalid expiry_date

test_setup.given: Todo with id 1 exists.
test_setup.then: Returns 400 error.

test_cases.description: Verify that updating a todo that does not exist returns an error.
test_cases.name: PUT /todos/{id} error for nonexistent todo id

test_setup.given: No todo with id 9999 exists.
test_setup.then: Returns 404 error.

test_cases.description: Verify that deleting a todo removes it and it is no longer accessible.
test_cases.name: DELETE /todos/{id} removes todo successfully

test_setup.given: Todo with id 1 exists.
test_setup.then: Returns 204. Subsequent GET /todos/1 returns 404.

test_cases.description: Verify that deleting a todo that does not exist returns an error.
test_cases.name: DELETE /todos/{id} error for nonexistent todo id

test_setup.given: No todo with id 9999 exists.
test_setup.then: Returns 404 error.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with notes as empty string is accepted and stored.
test_cases.name: POST /todos creates todo with notes as empty string

test_setup.given: No preconditions.
test_setup.then: Returns 201 and todo with notes as empty string.
test_setup.when: POST /todos with notes as empty string.

test_cases.description: Verify that creating a todo with description as empty string is accepted and stored.
test_cases.name: POST /todos creates todo with description as empty string

test_setup.given: No preconditions.
test_setup.then: Returns 201 and todo with description as empty string.
test_setup.when: POST /todos with description as empty string.

test_cases.description: Verify that GET /todos does not return a todo after it has been deleted.
test_cases.name: GET /todos does not return deleted todo

test_setup.given: Todo with id 1 was deleted; todo with id 2 exists.
test_setup.then: Returns 200 and only todos not deleted.

test_cases.description: Successfully retrieves a todo by ID when all fields are present.
test_cases.name: Get Todo By ID - Success With All Fields

test_setup.given: A todo with ID 1 exists with title, description, notes, and a valid expiry_date.
test_setup.then: The response includes all fields for the todo with a 200 status code.
test_setup.when: A GET request is made to /todos/1.

test_cases.description: Retrieves a todo that only has the required title field; optional fields are absent or null.
test_cases.name: Get Todo By ID - Only Required Field Present

test_setup.given: A todo with ID 2 exists with only the title field set.
test_setup.then: The response includes the title and other fields as null, with status 200.
test_setup.when: A GET request is made to /todos/2.

test_cases.description: Returns a 404 error when the specified todo does not exist.
test_cases.name: Get Todo By ID - Not Found

test_setup.given: There is no todo with ID 99999 in the database.
test_setup.then: A 404 error is returned with an appropriate error message.
test_setup.when: A GET request is made to /todos/99999.

test_cases.description: Returns a 422 or 400 error when the todo_id is not an integer.
test_cases.name: Get Todo By ID - Invalid Non-integer ID

test_setup.given: The API expects an integer for todo_id.
test_setup.then: A 422 or 400 error is returned indicating invalid ID type.
test_setup.when: A GET request is made to /todos/abc.

test_cases.description: Checks behavior when requesting a todo with ID 0, which may be invalid.
test_cases.name: Get Todo By ID - Edge Case: ID Zero

test_setup.given: No todo with ID 0 exists (IDs are positive integers).
test_setup.then: A 404 error is returned indicating the todo does not exist.
test_setup.when: A GET request is made to /todos/0.

test_cases.description: Checks how the API handles a very large integer ID that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Get Todo By ID - Edge Case: Very Large ID

test_setup.given: No todo with an extremely large ID exists.
test_setup.then: A 404 error is returned.
test_setup.when: A GET request is made to /todos/999999999999.

test_cases.description: Retrieves a todo where description, notes, and expiry_date are explicitly set to null.
test_cases.name: Get Todo By ID - Optional Fields Are Null

test_setup.given: A todo with ID 3 exists with optional fields explicitly set to null.
test_setup.then: The response includes the title and other fields as null, with status 200.
test_setup.when: A GET request is made to /todos/3.

test_cases.description: Retrieves a todo where expiry_date is in the past.
test_cases.name: Get Todo By ID - Past Expiry Date

response_body_json.description: This todo has a past expiry date.
response_body_json.title: Past Expiry

test_setup.given: A todo with ID 4 exists with an expiry_date in the past.
test_setup.then: The todo is returned as normal, regardless of expiry_date value.
test_setup.when: A GET request is made to /todos/4.

test_cases.description: Retrieves a todo with maximum allowed length in title, description, and notes fields.
test_cases.name: Get Todo By ID - Long Text Fields

test_setup.given: A todo with ID 5 exists with title, description, and notes at their maximum allowed lengths.
test_setup.then: All long fields are included in the response, truncated only if limited by the schema.
test_setup.when: A GET request is made to /todos/5.

test_cases.description: Retrieves a todo where optional fields are missing from the DB row (legacy data).
test_cases.name: Get Todo By ID - Database Row Missing Optional Fields

test_setup.given: A legacy todo with ID 6 exists, where only title is present in the DB row.
test_setup.then: The API fills in missing fields as null in the response.
test_setup.when: A GET request is made to /todos/6.

test_cases.description: Create a todo using all valid fields: title, description, notes, expiry_date.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all valid fields

test_setup.given: No pre-existing todos.
test_setup.then: Todo is created and returned with correct values.

test_cases.description: Create a todo with only title, omitting optional fields.
test_cases.name: Create todo with only required field

test_setup.given: No pre-existing todos.
test_setup.then: Todo is created with optional fields as null.

test_cases.description: Attempt to create a todo with empty title.
test_cases.name: Create todo with empty title

test_setup.given: No pre-existing todos.
test_setup.then: Error is returned for empty title.

test_cases.description: Attempt to create a todo omitting the title field.
test_cases.name: Create todo missing title

test_setup.given: No pre-existing todos.
test_setup.then: Error is returned for missing title.

test_cases.description: Create a todo with expiry_date not matching YYYY-MM-DD.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.given: No pre-existing todos.
test_setup.then: Error is returned for invalid expiry_date.

test_cases.description: Create a todo with expiry_date set to 2024-02-29 (valid leap year date).
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date on leap day

test_setup.given: No pre-existing todos.
test_setup.then: Todo is created with correct expiry_date.
test_setup.when: POST /todos with leap day as expiry_date.

test_cases.description: Create a todo with title at 255 characters.
test_cases.name: Create todo with long title

test_setup.given: No pre-existing todos.
test_setup.then: Todo is created successfully.

test_cases.description: Create todo with description and notes set to null.
test_cases.name: Create todo with description and notes explicitly null

test_setup.given: No pre-existing todos.
test_setup.then: Todo is created with null optional fields.
test_setup.when: POST /todos with description and notes null.

test_cases.description: Retrieve all todos after creating two todos.
test_cases.name: List all todos

test_setup.given: Two todos created as in previous test cases.
test_setup.then: Returns list of all existing todos with fields as stored.

test_cases.description: Retrieve a todo by a valid existing id.
test_cases.name: Get todo by valid id

test_setup.given: Todo with id 1 exists.
test_setup.then: Returns the full todo record.

test_cases.description: Attempt to get a todo with an id that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Get todo by non-existent id

test_setup.given: No todo with id 999.
test_setup.then: Returns error for non-existent todo.

test_cases.description: Update only the title of a todo.
test_cases.name: Update todo title only

test_setup.given: Todo with id 1 exists.
test_setup.then: Todo is updated, only title changes.

test_cases.description: Update title, description, expiry_date of a todo.
test_cases.name: Update multiple fields of todo

test_setup.given: Todo with id 2 exists.
test_setup.then: Only provided fields are updated.

test_cases.description: Update expiry_date with invalid format.
test_cases.name: Update todo with invalid expiry_date

test_setup.given: Todo with id 1 exists.
test_setup.then: Error is returned for invalid expiry_date.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update a todo that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Update todo with non-existent id

test_setup.given: No todo with id 999.
test_setup.then: Returns error for non-existent todo.

test_cases.description: Delete a todo with a valid existing id.
test_cases.name: Delete todo by valid id

test_setup.given: Todo with id 2 exists.
test_setup.then: Todo is deleted and no longer accessible.

test_cases.description: Attempt to delete a todo that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with non-existent id

test_setup.given: No todo with id 999.
test_setup.then: Returns error for non-existent todo.

test_cases.description: Try to get a todo after it was deleted.
test_cases.name: Access todo after deletion

test_setup.given: Todo with id 2 deleted in previous test.
test_setup.then: Todo is not found.

test_cases.description: Attempt to create a todo with expiry_date having invalid month or day.
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date invalid month/day

test_setup.given: No pre-existing todos.
test_setup.then: Error is returned for invalid expiry_date.
test_setup.when: POST /todos with invalid month in expiry_date.

test_cases.description: Attempt to create a todo with expiry_date as a number.
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date as non-string

response_body_json.error: expiry_date must be a string matching format YYYY-MM-DD.

test_setup.given: No pre-existing todos.
test_setup.then: Error is returned for invalid type.

test_cases.description: Update the notes field of a todo to null.
test_cases.name: Update notes field to null

test_setup.given: Todo with id 1 exists, notes is not null.
test_setup.then: Notes field is updated to null.

test_cases.description: Successfully update all fields of an existing todo with valid values. Only provided fields are updated.
test_cases.name: Update all fields with valid values

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=1 and initial title, description, notes, expiry_date.
test_setup.then: The todo is updated and returned with new values.
test_setup.when: A PUT request updates all fields with valid values.

test_cases.description: Update only the description field of an existing todo; other fields remain unchanged.
test_cases.name: Partial update - only description

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=2 and all fields set.
test_setup.then: Only the description is updated; other fields are unchanged.
test_setup.when: A PUT request updates only the description field.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update existing todo's title to an empty string; should return a validation error.
test_cases.name: Attempt to update title to an empty string

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=3.
test_setup.then: A 400 error is returned indicating title cannot be empty.
test_setup.when: A PUT request attempts to set the title to an empty string.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update expiry_date with an invalid date format (not YYYY-MM-DD); should return a validation error.
test_cases.name: Attempt to update expiry_date with invalid format

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=4.
test_setup.then: A 400 error is returned indicating the format requirement.
test_setup.when: A PUT request updates expiry_date with an invalid format.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update a todo that does not exist; should return 404.
test_cases.name: Update non-existent todo

test_setup.given: No todo exists with id=99999.
test_setup.then: A 404 error is returned.
test_setup.when: A PUT request attempts to update it.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update an existing todo with an empty request body; should return 400.
test_cases.name: No fields provided for update

response_body_json.detail: At least one field must be provided for update

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=5.
test_setup.then: A 400 error is returned indicating a field is required.
test_setup.when: A PUT request with an empty body is made.

test_cases.description: Successfully set the notes field to null (remove notes from todo).
test_cases.name: Update notes to null

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=6 and notes set.
test_setup.then: The notes field is removed (set to null) in the todo.
test_setup.when: A PUT request sets notes to null.

test_cases.description: Successfully update the title to a string of maximum allowed length (assume 255 chars).
test_cases.name: Update title to maximum allowed length

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=7.
test_setup.then: The todo's title is updated to maximum length.
test_setup.when: A PUT request sets the title to a 255-character string.

test_cases.description: Successfully remove the expiry_date field by setting it to null.
test_cases.name: Remove expiry_date (set to null)

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=8 and expiry_date set.
test_setup.then: The expiry_date is cleared (set to null) in the todo.
test_setup.when: A PUT request sets expiry_date to null.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update a todo with an unexpected field; should ignore extra fields and update only valid ones.
test_cases.name: Update with extra unexpected field

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=9.
test_setup.then: The valid field is updated; extra fields are ignored.
test_setup.when: A PUT request with a valid field and an extra field is made.

test_cases.description: Update expiry_date to '2024-02-29' (valid leap year date).
test_cases.name: Update expiry_date to valid leap year date

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=10.
test_setup.then: The expiry_date is updated to '2024-02-29'.
test_setup.when: A PUT request sets expiry_date to a valid leap year date.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update all updatable fields to empty strings; title must fail, others may be set to empty.
test_cases.name: Update all fields to empty strings (except expiry_date)

response_body_json.detail: Title cannot be empty; expiry_date must be in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format

test_setup.given: A todo exists with id=11.
test_setup.then: A 400 error is returned for invalid title and expiry_date.
test_setup.when: A PUT request sets all fields to empty strings.

test_cases.description: Deletes a todo item that exists, and verifies it is no longer accessible.
test_cases.name: Delete existing todo successfully

test_setup.given: A todo item with id=1 exists in the database.
test_setup.then: The response is 204 No Content and the todo is deleted; subsequent GET /todos/1 returns 404.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo with an ID that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Delete non-existent todo

test_setup.given: No todo with id=9999 exists.
test_setup.then: A 404 error is returned indicating the todo does not exist.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo with a non-integer ID, expecting a 422 validation error.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with non-integer ID (string)

test_setup.given: The API expects an integer todo_id.
test_setup.then: A 422 Unprocessable Entity error is returned due to invalid ID type.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo with a negative ID, expecting a 404 or 422 error.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with negative ID

test_setup.given: No todo can have a negative ID.
test_setup.then: A 404 Not Found error is returned.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo with ID zero, which should not exist.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with zero ID

test_setup.given: No todo with id=0 exists.
test_setup.then: A 404 Not Found error is returned.

test_cases.description: Deletes a todo and attempts to delete it again, verifying correct error handling.
test_cases.name: Delete same todo twice

test_setup.given: A todo with id=2 exists.
test_setup.then: First call returns 204, second call returns 404 since the todo was deleted.
test_setup.when: DELETE /todos/2 is called, then called again.

test_cases.description: Sends a DELETE with a JSON body, which should be ignored and not cause an error.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with unexpected request body

test_setup.given: A todo with id=3 exists.
test_setup.then: The todo is deleted and the request body is ignored; 204 is returned.
test_setup.when: DELETE /todos/3 is called with a JSON body.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo with an unreasonably large ID value.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with extremely large ID

test_setup.given: No todo with such a large ID exists.
test_setup.then: A 404 Not Found error is returned.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo with a float as the ID, which should not be allowed.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with float ID

test_setup.given: The API expects an integer todo_id.
test_setup.then: A 422 Unprocessable Entity error is returned due to invalid ID.
